summary: a Retexture of the Famous Clavicus Warhammer by Jadax4, Original not Needed
descriptionHtml:
I ONLY RETEXTURED A WEAPON MADE BY [b]JADAX4[/b]!

The Original File is not Needed, I have Permission from the Author to Use His Meshes.
 
I Really Liked the Design of this Warhammer and Decided to make a Retexture to Fit my Character's Shoes, I Hope this Fits with your Character's shoes aswell.

You can Craft the Warhammer at the Forge under Ebony, No Perks Required

Installation
Put Everything Included in the .zip inside You Skyrim's Data Folder.

Please Endorse My Page and check Out JADAX4's Clavicus Warhammer and Endorse his Stuff too.. Rock On
author: Behringer911
